Ensure that HEALTHCHECK instructions have been added to container images.

**[HealthcheckExists](https://appthreat.com?q=CKV_DOCKER_2)**

## Documentation

- [AWS Terraform](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/aws/latest/docs)
- [Azure Terraform](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/azurerm/latest/docs)

details.name: Ensure that HEALTHCHECK instructions have been added to container images.
details.snippetText:
1 FROM docker.io/eclipse-temurin:19-jre-focal
LABEL NAME = "WebGoat: A deliberately insecure Web Application"
MAINTAINER "WebGoat team"

findings.title:
Credential in plaintext?

Rule: Env Var
Line:   String PASSWORD = "!!webgoat_admin_1234!!";

Commit: .
findings.description:
The application stores sensitive information in cleartext within a resource that might be accessible to another control sphere.

## Additional information

**[Env Var](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/312.html)**

Commit: .
